page.title: 02A Typical Thursday
page.content: On Thursday I wake up with a yawn, at 7 o'clock and wash my face and dress myself in my school uniform. I go downstairs and have breakfast of cornflakes with milk.Then my Mum combs my hair and off I go, not to my own school first, but to my sister's to drop her off.If I am early I talk to my friend. When my teacher arrives she calls the register and then the bell goes for chapel where the headmistress talks about Jesus.After that we have Maths until break when we go out to play.I usually play 'horses' with my friend.After break we do our 'Ginn' until lunch.After lunch a teacher comes in and says Grace.We put our lunchboxes under the table and go to Speech and Drama taken by Mrs. Wells. We work on our projects until home-time.In the evening I go swimming Written by Mehnaz Siddiqui(8)
